特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will be implemented in a face-to-face format.

第3回: The Role of Leaders in Foreign Policy Making
第6回: The Domestic Factor in Foreign Policy
第7回: The International Environment and Constraints on Choice
第8回: Summary of Foreign Policy Analysis as Described by Breuning
第12回: Errors of Perception and Foreign Policy
トピック.授業外学習2: As a general rule, students should expect to spend one to two minutes of study outside of class for every minute of class time.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading2: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)

name: 【320】Foreign Policy Analysis／Foreign Policy Analysis [EN]
